Headline: #96 Lunt Temporary Westbound Reroute near Morse/Red Line
ShortDescription: WB 96 Lunt buses are temporarily rerouted via Lunt, Ashland, Morse, Clark, & Lunt due to street blockage near Morse/Red Line.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #96 Lunt buses are temporarily rerouted via Lunt, Ashland, Morse, Clark, and Lunt, due to street blockage near Morse/Red Line.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
